segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is really disgusting to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing all that water just pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger and bigger, it's quite unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how the woman can't feel the water on her foot, it's so gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so messy and chaotic, it's really off-putting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should really turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just flowing right over the edge of the sink, it's so unpleasant to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she notices the water soon before it causes any more damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is just so messy and chaotic, it's really disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't understand how she hasn't noticed any of this yet, it's so obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is really grossing me out.
